title: Bernie Sanders Is An ‘Utter Moron’ According To Decorated Actor James Woods
text: Out of all the upcoming Democratic hopefuls for the 2016 Presidency, the one that is receiving the most attention is Bernie Sanders. Hailing out of Vermont, the incumbent of the United States Senate has been garnering a lot of the popular vote among liberals for his ideals and plans for the country if he were...
